title: Synthesis, characterization and As(III) scavenging behaviours of mango peel waste loaded with Zr(IV) ion from contaminated water
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Deepak Gyawali, Samjhana Poudel, Madan Poudel, Kedar Nath Ghimire, Megh Raj Pokhrel, Prabin Basnet, Krishna Bahadur BK, Hari Paudyal
